languages.text:
The {g|Encyclopedia:CareerStrategistGlossary}Grand Strategist{/g} chooses one {g|f:e4e45f74936c4740b7bc03013f6991ba}Combat Tactics{/g} area. Every ally inside that area, except the Grand Strategist, gains an {g|Encyclopedia:ExtraTurn}extra turn{/g} with 1 {g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}AP{/g} and 2 {g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}MP{/g} at the start of the Grand Strategist's next turn.
For every enemy that was killed in the selected {g|f:e4e45f74936c4740b7bc03013f6991ba}Combat Tactics{/g} area, this AP is increased by +1 (up to a maximum of 3) and MP by +2 (up to a maximum of 6).
The Grand Strategist's MP are reduced to 1 until the end of combat.
languages.original_text:
Великий {g|Encyclopedia:CareerStrategistGlossary}стратег{/g} выбирает зону стратегического плана. В начале следующего хода великого стратега каждый союзник внутри нее получает {g|Encyclopedia:ExtraTurn}дополнительный ход{/g} с 1 {g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}ОД{/g} и 2 {g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}ОП{/g}.
Каждый противник, убитый в этой зоне, увеличивает количество предоставляемых ОД на 1 (до 3) и ОП на 2 (до 6).
Число ОП великого стратега сокращается до 1 до конца боя.

traits.locale_text:
The Strategist chooses one combat tactics area. Every ally inside that area gains an additional turn with 1 AP and 2 MP at the start of the Strategist's next turn.
For every enemy that was killed in the selected combat tactics area, this AP is increased by +1 (up to maximum 3) and MP by +2 (up to maximum 6).
The Strategist's MP is reduced to 1 until the end of combat.

The {g|Encyclopedia:CareerStrategistGlossary}Grand Strategist{/g} chooses one combat tactics area. Every ally inside that area gains an {g|Encyclopedia:ExtraTurn}extra turn{/g} with 1 {g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}AP{/g} and 2 {g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}MP{/g} at the start of the Grand Strategist's next turn.
For every enemy that was killed in the selected combat tactics area, this AP is increased by +1 (up to a maximum of 3) and MP by +2 (up to a maximum of 6).
The Grand Strategist's MP are reduced to 1 until the end of combat.

The {g|Encyclopedia:CareerStrategistGlossary}Grand Strategist{/g} chooses one combat tactics area. Every ally inside that area gains an {g|Encyclopedia:ExtraTurn}extra turn{/g} with 1 {g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}AP{/g} and 2 {g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}MP{/g} at the start of the Grand Strategist's next turn.
For every enemy that was killed in the selected combat tactics area, this AP is increased by +1 (up to a maximum of 3) and MP by +2 (up to a maximum of 6).
The Grand Strategist's MP are reduced to 1 until the end of combat.

languages.text:
{g|Encyclopedia:CareerStrategistGlossary}战略大师{/g}选择一片{g|f:e4e45f74936c4740b7bc03013f6991ba}战斗策略{/g}区域。该区域内所有盟友（战略大师本人不包括在内）在战略大师的下个回合开始时，都会获得一个{g|Encyclopedia:ExtraTurn}额外回合{/g}，拥有1点{g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}行动点数{/g}与2点{g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}移动点数{/g}。
该片{g|f:e4e45f74936c4740b7bc03013f6991ba}战斗策略{/g}区域内每有一名敌人死亡，所有盟友获得的行动点数提高1点（最多3点），获得的移动点数提高2点（最多6点）。
然而，战略大师的移动点数会降至1点，效果持续至战斗结束。
languages.original_text:
The {g|Encyclopedia:CareerStrategistGlossary}Grand Strategist{/g} chooses one {g|f:e4e45f74936c4740b7bc03013f6991ba}Combat Tactics{/g} area. Every ally inside that area, except the Grand Strategist, gains an {g|Encyclopedia:ExtraTurn}extra turn{/g} with 1 {g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}AP{/g} and 2 {g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}MP{/g} at the start of the Grand Strategist's next turn.
For every enemy that was killed in the selected {g|f:e4e45f74936c4740b7bc03013f6991ba}Combat Tactics{/g} area, this AP is increased by +1 (up to a maximum of 3) and MP by +2 (up to a maximum of 6).
The Grand Strategist's MP are reduced to 1 until the end of combat.

traits.locale_text:
{g|Encyclopedia:CareerStrategistGlossary}战略大师{/g}选择一片{g|f:e4e45f74936c4740b7bc03013f6991ba}战斗策略{/g}区域。该区域内所有盟友（战略大师本人不包括在内）在战略大师的下个回合开始时，都会获得一个{g|Encyclopedia:ExtraTurn}额外回合{/g}，拥有1点{g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}行动点数{/g}与2点{g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}移动点数{/g}。
该片{g|f:e4e45f74936c4740b7bc03013f6991ba}战斗策略{/g}区域内每有一名敌人死亡，所有盟友获得的行动点数提高1点（最多3点），获得的移动点数提高2点（最多6点）。
然而，战略大师的移动点数会降至1点，效果持续至战斗结束。

{g|Encyclopedia:CareerStrategistGlossary}战略大师{/g}选择一片战斗策略区域。该区域内所有盟友在战略大师的下个{g|Encyclopedia:Turn}回合{/g}开始时，都会获得一个{g|Encyclopedia:ExtraTurn}额外回合{/g}，拥有1点{g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}行动点数{/g}与2点{g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}移动点数{/g}。
该片战斗区域内每有一名敌人死亡，所有盟友获得的行动点数提高1点（最多3点），获得的移动点数提高2点（最多6点）。
然而，战略大师的移动点数会降低至1点，效果持续至战斗结束。

languages.text:
El {g|Encyclopedia:CareerStrategistGlossary}gran estratega{/g} elige una de las zonas designadas por {g|f:e4e45f74936c4740b7bc03013f6991ba}Tácticas de combate{/g}. Todos los aliados en esa zona excepto el gran estratega ganan un {g|Encyclopedia:ExtraTurn}turno extra{/g} con 1 {g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}PA{/g} y 2 {g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}PM{/g} al comienzo del próximo turno del gran estratega.
Por cada enemigo que se haya abatido en la zona de {g|f:e4e45f74936c4740b7bc03013f6991ba}Tácticas de combate{/g} seleccionada, los PA otorgados aumentan en +1 (hasta un máximo de 3) y los PM en +2 (hasta un máximo de 6).
Los PM del gran estratega se reducen a 1 hasta el final del combate.
languages.original_text:
The {g|Encyclopedia:CareerStrategistGlossary}Grand Strategist{/g} chooses one {g|f:e4e45f74936c4740b7bc03013f6991ba}Combat Tactics{/g} area. Every ally inside that area, except the Grand Strategist, gains an {g|Encyclopedia:ExtraTurn}extra turn{/g} with 1 {g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}AP{/g} and 2 {g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}MP{/g} at the start of the Grand Strategist's next turn.
For every enemy that was killed in the selected {g|f:e4e45f74936c4740b7bc03013f6991ba}Combat Tactics{/g} area, this AP is increased by +1 (up to a maximum of 3) and MP by +2 (up to a maximum of 6).
The Grand Strategist's MP are reduced to 1 until the end of combat.

traits.locale_text:
El {g|Encyclopedia:CareerStrategistGlossary}gran estratega{/g} elige una de las zonas designadas por {g|f:e4e45f74936c4740b7bc03013f6991ba}Tácticas de combate{/g}. Todos los aliados en esa zona excepto el gran estratega ganan un {g|Encyclopedia:ExtraTurn}turno extra{/g} con 1 {g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}PA{/g} y 2 {g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}PM{/g} al comienzo del próximo turno del gran estratega.
Por cada enemigo que se haya abatido en la zona de {g|f:e4e45f74936c4740b7bc03013f6991ba}Tácticas de combate{/g} seleccionada, los PA otorgados aumentan en +1 (hasta un máximo de 3) y los PM en +2 (hasta un máximo de 6).
Los PM del gran estratega se reducen a 1 hasta el final del combate.

languages.text:
{g|Encyclopedia:CareerStrategistGlossary}大戦略家{/g}は{g|f:e4e45f74936c4740b7bc03013f6991ba}軍略{/g}エリアをひとつ選択する。その範囲内の仲間全員が、（大戦略家以外）軍師の次のターン開始時に{g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}AP{/g} 1と{g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}MP{/g} 2が付与される{g|Encyclopedia:ExtraTurn}追加ターン{/g}を獲得する。
選択した{g|f:e4e45f74936c4740b7bc03013f6991ba}軍略{/g}エリア内で敵を倒すたび、この付与APは +1 (最大3まで)、付与MPは +2 (最大6まで)増加する。
軍師のMPは戦闘終了まで１減少する。
languages.original_text:
The {g|Encyclopedia:CareerStrategistGlossary}Grand Strategist{/g} chooses one {g|f:e4e45f74936c4740b7bc03013f6991ba}Combat Tactics{/g} area. Every ally inside that area, except the Grand Strategist, gains an {g|Encyclopedia:ExtraTurn}extra turn{/g} with 1 {g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}AP{/g} and 2 {g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}MP{/g} at the start of the Grand Strategist's next turn.
For every enemy that was killed in the selected {g|f:e4e45f74936c4740b7bc03013f6991ba}Combat Tactics{/g} area, this AP is increased by +1 (up to a maximum of 3) and MP by +2 (up to a maximum of 6).
The Grand Strategist's MP are reduced to 1 until the end of combat.

traits.locale_text:
{g|Encyclopedia:CareerStrategistGlossary}大戦略家{/g}は{g|f:e4e45f74936c4740b7bc03013f6991ba}軍略{/g}エリアをひとつ選択する。その範囲内の仲間全員が、（大戦略家以外）軍師の次のターン開始時に{g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}AP{/g} 1と{g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}MP{/g} 2が付与される{g|Encyclopedia:ExtraTurn}追加ターン{/g}を獲得する。
選択した{g|f:e4e45f74936c4740b7bc03013f6991ba}軍略{/g}エリア内で敵を倒すたび、この付与APは +1 (最大3まで)、付与MPは +2 (最大6まで)増加する。
軍師のMPは戦闘終了まで１減少する。

{g|Encyclopedia:CareerStrategistGlossary}大戦略家{/g}は戦術範囲をひとつ選択する。戦術範囲内の仲間全員が、軍師の次の{g|Encyclopedia:Turn}ターン{/g}開始時に1 {g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}AP{/g}と2 {g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}MP{/g}が付与される{g|Encyclopedia:ExtraTurn}追加ターン{/g}を獲得する。
選択した戦術範囲内で敵を倒すたび、この付与APは +1 (最大3まで)、付与MPは +2 (最大6まで)増加する。
軍師のMPは戦闘終了まで１減少する。

languages.text:
Великий {g|Encyclopedia:CareerStrategistGlossary}стратег{/g} выбирает зону {g|f:e4e45f74936c4740b7bc03013f6991ba}Стратегического плана{/g}. В начале следующего хода великого стратега каждый союзник, кроме великого стратега, внутри нее получает {g|Encyclopedia:ExtraTurn}дополнительный ход{/g} с 1 {g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}ОД{/g} и 2 {g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}ОП{/g}.
Каждый противник, убитый в этой зоне, увеличивает количество предоставляемых ОД на 1 (до 3) и ОП на 2 (до 6).
Число ОП великого стратега сокращается до 1 до конца боя.

The Grand Strategist's MP are reduced to 1 until the end of combat.

traits.locale_text:
Великий {g|Encyclopedia:CareerStrategistGlossary}стратег{/g} выбирает зону {g|f:e4e45f74936c4740b7bc03013f6991ba}Стратегического плана{/g}. В начале следующего хода великого стратега каждый союзник, кроме великого стратега, внутри нее получает {g|Encyclopedia:ExtraTurn}дополнительный ход{/g} с 1 {g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}ОД{/g} и 2 {g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}ОП{/g}.
Каждый противник, убитый в этой зоне, увеличивает количество предоставляемых ОД на 1 (до 3) и ОП на 2 (до 6).
Число ОП великого стратега сокращается до 1 до конца боя.

Стратег выбирает зону стратегического плана. В начале следующего хода стратега каждый союзник внутри нее получает дополнительный ход с 1 ОД и 2 ОП.
Каждый противник, убитый в этой зоне, увеличивает количество предоставляемых ОД на 1 (до 3) и ОП на 2 (до 6).
Число ОП стратега сокращается до 1 до конца боя.

languages.text:
Der {g|Encyclopedia:CareerStrategistGlossary}Großstratege{/g} wählt ein {g|f:e4e45f74936c4740b7bc03013f6991ba}Gefechtstaktiken{/g}-Gebiet aus. Alle Verbündeten in diesem Gebiet (der Großstratege ausgenommen) erhalten zu Beginn des nächsten Zuges des Großstrategen einen {g|Encyclopedia:ExtraTurn}Zusatzzug{/g} mit 1 {g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}AP{/g} und 2 {g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}BP{/g}.
Für jeden im gewählten {g|f:e4e45f74936c4740b7bc03013f6991ba}Gefechtstaktiken{/g}-Gebiet getöteten Feind erhöhen sich diese AP um +1 (auf max. 3) und die BP um +2 (auf max. 6).
Die BP des Großstrategen werden bis zum Ende des Kampfes auf 1 reduziert.
languages.original_text:
The {g|Encyclopedia:CareerStrategistGlossary}Grand Strategist{/g} chooses one {g|f:e4e45f74936c4740b7bc03013f6991ba}Combat Tactics{/g} area. Every ally inside that area, except the Grand Strategist, gains an {g|Encyclopedia:ExtraTurn}extra turn{/g} with 1 {g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}AP{/g} and 2 {g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}MP{/g} at the start of the Grand Strategist's next turn.
For every enemy that was killed in the selected {g|f:e4e45f74936c4740b7bc03013f6991ba}Combat Tactics{/g} area, this AP is increased by +1 (up to a maximum of 3) and MP by +2 (up to a maximum of 6).
The Grand Strategist's MP are reduced to 1 until the end of combat.

traits.locale_text:
Der {g|Encyclopedia:CareerStrategistGlossary}Großstratege{/g} wählt ein {g|f:e4e45f74936c4740b7bc03013f6991ba}Gefechtstaktiken{/g}-Gebiet aus. Alle Verbündeten in diesem Gebiet (der Großstratege ausgenommen) erhalten zu Beginn des nächsten Zuges des Großstrategen einen {g|Encyclopedia:ExtraTurn}Zusatzzug{/g} mit 1 {g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}AP{/g} und 2 {g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}BP{/g}.
Für jeden im gewählten {g|f:e4e45f74936c4740b7bc03013f6991ba}Gefechtstaktiken{/g}-Gebiet getöteten Feind erhöhen sich diese AP um +1 (auf max. 3) und die BP um +2 (auf max. 6).
Die BP des Großstrategen werden bis zum Ende des Kampfes auf 1 reduziert.

languages.text:
Le {g|Encyclopedia:CareerStrategistGlossary}grand stratège{/g} choisit une zone de {g|f:e4e45f74936c4740b7bc03013f6991ba}Tactiques de combat{/g}. Chaque allié présent dans cette zone (à l’exception du grand stratège) bénéficie d'un {g|Encyclopedia:ExtraTurn}tour supplémentaire{/g} avec 1 {g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}PA{/g} et 2 {g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}PD{/g} au début du tour suivant du grand stratège.
Pour chaque ennemi éliminé dans la zone de {g|f:e4e45f74936c4740b7bc03013f6991ba}Tactiques de combat{/g} sélectionnée, il obtient également +1 PA (jusqu'à un maximum de 3) et +2 PD (jusqu'à un maximum de 6).
Les PD du grand stratège sont réduits à 1 jusqu'à la fin du combat.
languages.original_text:
The {g|Encyclopedia:CareerStrategistGlossary}Grand Strategist{/g} chooses one {g|f:e4e45f74936c4740b7bc03013f6991ba}Combat Tactics{/g} area. Every ally inside that area, except the Grand Strategist, gains an {g|Encyclopedia:ExtraTurn}extra turn{/g} with 1 {g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}AP{/g} and 2 {g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}MP{/g} at the start of the Grand Strategist's next turn.
For every enemy that was killed in the selected {g|f:e4e45f74936c4740b7bc03013f6991ba}Combat Tactics{/g} area, this AP is increased by +1 (up to a maximum of 3) and MP by +2 (up to a maximum of 6).
The Grand Strategist's MP are reduced to 1 until the end of combat.

traits.locale_text:
Le {g|Encyclopedia:CareerStrategistGlossary}grand stratège{/g} choisit une zone de {g|f:e4e45f74936c4740b7bc03013f6991ba}Tactiques de combat{/g}. Chaque allié présent dans cette zone (à l’exception du grand stratège) bénéficie d'un {g|Encyclopedia:ExtraTurn}tour supplémentaire{/g} avec 1 {g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}PA{/g} et 2 {g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}PD{/g} au début du tour suivant du grand stratège.
Pour chaque ennemi éliminé dans la zone de {g|f:e4e45f74936c4740b7bc03013f6991ba}Tactiques de combat{/g} sélectionnée, il obtient également +1 PA (jusqu'à un maximum de 3) et +2 PD (jusqu'à un maximum de 6).
Les PD du grand stratège sont réduits à 1 jusqu'à la fin du combat.

languages.text:
{g|Encyclopedia:CareerStrategistGlossary}Büyük Stratejist{/g}, bir {g|f:e4e45f74936c4740b7bc03013f6991ba}Çatışma Taktikleri{/g} alanı seçer. O alandaki Büyük Stratejist haricindeki her dost birim, Büyük Stratejist'in bir sonraki turunun başlangıcında 1 {g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}EP{/g} ve 2 {g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}HP{/g}'ye sahip bir {g|Encyclopedia:ExtraTurn}ek tur{/g} kazanır.
Seçilen {g|f:e4e45f74936c4740b7bc03013f6991ba}Çatışma Taktikleri{/g} alanında öldürülen her düşman için bu EP +1 (maksimum 3), HP ise +2 (maksimum 6) artar.
Büyük Stratejist'in HP'si 1'e düşer ve bu etki, çatışma sonuna dek sürer.
languages.original_text:
The {g|Encyclopedia:CareerStrategistGlossary}Grand Strategist{/g} chooses one {g|f:e4e45f74936c4740b7bc03013f6991ba}Combat Tactics{/g} area. Every ally inside that area, except the Grand Strategist, gains an {g|Encyclopedia:ExtraTurn}extra turn{/g} with 1 {g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}AP{/g} and 2 {g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}MP{/g} at the start of the Grand Strategist's next turn.
For every enemy that was killed in the selected {g|f:e4e45f74936c4740b7bc03013f6991ba}Combat Tactics{/g} area, this AP is increased by +1 (up to a maximum of 3) and MP by +2 (up to a maximum of 6).
The Grand Strategist's MP are reduced to 1 until the end of combat.

traits.locale_text:
{g|Encyclopedia:CareerStrategistGlossary}Büyük Stratejist{/g}, bir {g|f:e4e45f74936c4740b7bc03013f6991ba}Çatışma Taktikleri{/g} alanı seçer. O alandaki Büyük Stratejist haricindeki her dost birim, Büyük Stratejist'in bir sonraki turunun başlangıcında 1 {g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}EP{/g} ve 2 {g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}HP'ye{/g} sahip bir {g|Encyclopedia:ExtraTurn}ek tur{/g} kazanır.
Seçilen {g|f:e4e45f74936c4740b7bc03013f6991ba}Çatışma Taktikleri{/g} alanında öldürülen her düşman için bu EP +1 (maksimum 3), HP ise +2 (maksimum 6) artar.
